From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>

** Carnage looked around a bit, using her scanners to see farther in the 
distance then her eye sight could reach. She was looking for cover for the 
night but in a place where they might be able to find a bit of dry wood to 
make a fire for heat and to cook over.
It was also a well known fact that the carcass of a dead animal bloats and 
the meat is ruined if too much water gets into it, and the last thing she 
wanted to do was lose a good two nights meal. So, in plain, if she didn't 
find shelter she would have to make it and that might require a little 
digging.
Carnage suddenly glanced towards Teltoli as she babbled off about the lights 
at Cybertron, almost wondering if the fuzor ever thought that she DID know 
just what Cybertron was. After all, she use to live there.
But she never voiced anything, turning her attention back towards finding 
some shelter.
Carnage grumbled to herself, her eyes and scanners searching but coming up 
with nothing other then tree roots and dirt. But, luckily, the ground was 
soft from the rain and would be easy on the claws. Looking down at them, 
thinking that she would have to get dirty tonight.
Her head snapped at the suddenly yelp Teltoli let off after tripping, her 
eyes wide with the thought of sudden attack but then her muscles eased when 
she realized what had happened. ** " Haven't got your fighting legs yet?" ** 
So the term went when someone got back after a long vacation or something, 
seeming a little clumsy before setting back into the rhythm of things.
Carnage singly give Teltoli a little tik of a smile before looking around a 
bit for a nice place to begin digging. She just hoped that digging in the 
mud wasn't under Teltoli's standards.
She stopped and looked about a bit before she saw just the right place to 
dig, tilting her back and letting the dead pigs roll off before walking over 
to the trunk of a tree and inspecting the ground at it's base. Poking at it 
for a moment with her claw, Carnage was just about to set to work digging 
when Teltoli suddenly gave off a little yell and she jumped.
Carnage growled and snapped her head towards the young woman, an expression 
of annoyance on her face. Slag! What antics for a woman!
She sniffed to clear her nose, her claws already in the dirt and ready to 
get to work. But she kept her head turned towards Teltoli to see if she 
could get just what the fuzor thought was so interesting, her eyes turned 
towards the twinkling start which showed through the dark clouds.
All this excitement over balls of flaming gas? Carnage sighed, such antics.
Teltoli seemed to be acting as if her eyes had just been opened after being 
blind until now. Always excited about the organic world around her and eager 
to explore. This world was, indeed, very wonderful. But there were also many 
dangers and there was still a war going on, so one could never let down 
their guard.
Carnage simply looked at the stars, never really seeing nothing beyond the 
brightest ones, simply pretending so that Teltoli might not be 
disappointed.** " Oh! That's neat."
** But before she could say anything else Carnage set her claws deep into 
the soil and began to dig, throwing the dirt that she was taking away 
between her hind legs and away from the base of the tree. Even if they had 
to spend the night in the rain she was going to make sure that those pigs 
were dry. No one liked bloated meat. **
